casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Bobby HADDOCK. No. 292P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 16, 2006. Bobby D. Haddock, Jr., Pro Se. Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 2nd day of June 2006 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th day of November 2006."
